string.text: Let's talk about things you want to buy...
Sure, do you have it?
Yep, here it is.
Thanks man, and here's your payment.
Nope, sorry I don't have it now.
Then come back later and bring the stuff with you.
Actually, I've changed my mind.
Are you sure? Man, I need it! Please, think about it.
Well ok, here, take it.
Ok, I'll bring the stuff later.
Yep I'm sure, I won't give it.
Ok, as you wish. Now go.
Let's talk about things you want to sell...
Sure, so you want to buy it?
Yep, here's your money.
And here it is. A pleasure doing business with you.
Nope, sorry I don't have enough cash now.
Then come back later... with cash.
Nah, I've changed my mind.
Are you sure? You want to buy it or not?
Well ok, here, take the money.
Ok, I'll be back later with cash.
No, thanks. I don't need it.
As you wish. I'm sure I'll find another buyer.
So, you know things, right?
That is correct... if you have enough cash.
Ok, here you have it. Now your turn.
Yeah, so listen:
Sorry but I don't have enough cash now.
Then come back later... with cash.
You know what, I've change my mind.
Are you sure? I won't propose it twice.
Well ok, here, take the money.
Ok, I'll be back later with cash.
No thanks, I don't need to know.
It's up to you. Bye.
